item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: March 31, 2023 Today's Verse Matthew 5:46â€“48 [46] For if you love those who love you, what reward do you have? Do not even the tax collectors do the same? [47] And if you greet only your brothers, what more are you doing than others? Do not even the Gentiles do the same? [48] You therefore must be perfect, as your heavenly Father is perfect. Today's Memory Verse Matthew 11:28-30 - Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
